dishes.name: Roasted Butternut Pumpkin, Shiitake Mushroom and Haloumi Salad
dishes.description: A hearty mix of fresh greens, roasted vegetables adn golden heloumi makes up this tasty winter salad.

dishes.name: Slow-cooked, Italian Beef Cheek Ragú with Pappardelle
dishes.description: Slow-cooked beef cheek ragù. Serve with just-cooked pappardelle and sprinkle with lashings of Parmesan, of course.

dishes.name: Chicken Cotoletta with Brussels Sprouts, Rocket and Hazelnut Salad
dishes.description: The super-crispy outer also happens to be gluten free.
